description:
Kurama and Hiei join Yusuke and Kuwabara in battle against the Saint Beasts. After the awkward allies struggle through the Gate of Betrayal, they face the first Beast: a giant made of solid stone!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cele patru bestii sacre. O provocare pentru lumea spirituală
Kurama et le combat de la rose
Utsukushiki Bara no Mai! Karei Naru Kurama
美しきバラの舞! 華麗なる蔵馬
